blogPost.title: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell speaks with @NickTimiraos at the #WSJFuture of Everything Festival https://t.co/RRZfvFeocu
blogPost.author: The Wall Street Journal

localize.full_text: パウエル米連邦準備制度理事会議長、#WSJFuture of Everything Festival で @NickTimiraos と対談 https://t.co/RRZfvFeocu
美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在#WSJFuture of Everything Festival上与@NickTimiraos交谈https://t.co/RRZfvFeocu。
美聯儲主席傑羅姆-鮑威爾在#WSJFuture of Everything Festival上與@NickTimiraos交談https://t.co/RRZfvFeocu。

previous.title: Musician and entrepreneur @JBALVIN speaks with @Ellie_Austin_ at the #WSJFuture of Everything Festival https://t.co/x1LHfG2ep4

localize.full_text: 音楽家で起業家のJBALVINが、#WSJFuture of Everything Festivalで@Ellie_Austin_と対談 https://t.co/x1LHfG2ep4
音乐家和企业家@JBALVIN在#WSJFuture of Everything Festival上与@Ellie_Austin_对话 https://t.co/x1LHfG2ep4
音樂家和企業家@JBALVIN在#WSJFuture of Everything Festival上與@Ellie_Austin_對話 https://t.co/x1LHfG2ep4

next.title: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell says the central bank needs to see that inflation pressures are abating to determine how to calibrate its approach to setting interest rates #WSJFuture https://t.co/1Gn6pMV6uV https://t.co/jCgor4rBaf

localize.full_text: パウエル米連邦準備制度理事会（FRB）議長、中央銀行はインフレ圧力が和らいでいることを確認し、金利設定のアプローチをどのように調整するかを決定する必要があると発言 #WSJFuture https://t.co/1Gn6pMV6uV https://t.co/jCgor4rBaf。
美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔表示，央行需要看到通胀压力正在减弱，以确定如何校准其设定利率的方法#WSJFuture https://t.co/1Gn6pMV6uV https://t.co/jCgor4rBaf
美聯儲主席傑羅姆-鮑威爾表示，央行需要看到通脹壓力正在減弱，以確定如何校準其設定利率的方法#WSJFuture https://t.co/1Gn6pMV6uV https://t.co/jCgor4rBaf
